abstract: Federal authorities report Apolinar Altamirano was awaiting deportation hearing and was out on bond when he shot and killed clerk Grant Ronnebeck in convenience store near Phoenix; Altamirano faces first-degree murder charge.
lead_paragraph: A man awaiting a deportation hearing was out on bond when he killed a Phoenix-area convenience store clerk over a pack of cigarettes, federal authorities said.
snippet: A man awaiting a deportation hearing was out on bond when he killed a Phoenix-area convenience store clerk over a pack of cigarettes, federal authorities said.
